title: Full Stack Development Bootcamp
content: An intensive online course covering frontend, backend, databases, and deployment.

title: Data Science with Python
content: A hands-on course exploring data analysis, machine learning, and visualization with Python.

title: Computer Networks
content: An in-depth exploration of networking principles, protocols, and architectures.

title: Database Management Systems
content: Course covering relational databases, SQL, indexing, and transactions.
